channel.title: Agressive NPCs
channel.description: I've made a thread about this before but never got anywhere, but wondering how you get NPCs to attack each other. I'm so lost I wouldn't even know where to look. Anyone help, have ideas, or anything?

item.title: Agressive NPCs
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“meatstick, post:7, topic:377543”][quote author=Vengeance e link=topic=473439.msg3463832#msg3463832 date=1294743593]
You could make new fightevent for that called ‘NpcFightEvent’ and make the constructor Npc attacker, Npc opponent, or you could modify the current fightevent constructor and run to work with both player vs npc and npc vs npc.
[/quote]
This.

As for the error, It’s impossible to help you without the code, as NullPointerException @ line 49 could be anything…[/quote]
I know what the error is fyi

Read full topic

You could make new fightevent for that called ‘NpcFightEvent’ and make the constructor Npc attacker, Npc opponent, or you could modify the current fightevent constructor and run to work with both player vs npc and npc vs npc.

item.title: Agressive NPCs
item.dc:creator: @Vengeance_e Vengeance e
item.description:
@Vengeance_e wrote:

You could make new fightevent for that called ‘NpcFightEvent’ and make the constructor Npc attacker, Npc opponent, or you could modify the current fightevent constructor and run to work with both player vs npc and npc vs npc.

Read full topic

item.title: Agressive NPCs
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“meatstick, post:3, topic:377543”]I don’t have the source, but i’ll give you some hints;

FightEvent (instead of Player - Npc, it’s Npc - Npc)
In Mob(?).java there should be a method called “findVictim”, copy this and change Player to Npc, make sure this != (Victim)Npc

I can’t remember more, post your progress here and I’ll help you[/quote]
Thank you helps alot!

Edit:
Stuck atm…[code]runserver:
[java] Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.NullPointerException
[java] at org.rscdaemon.server.event.FightEvent.run(FightEvent.java:49)

 [java]     at org.rscdaemon.server.DelayedEventHandler.doEvents(DelayedEven

tHandler.java:55)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GameEngine.processEvents(GameEngine.java
:174)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:110)[/code]

I think i need to change the run method in FightEvent to fit NPC qualities, seeing as it’s made for players.

Read full topic

item.title: Agressive NPCs

item.title: Agressive NPCs
item.dc:creator: @meatstick meatstick
item.description:
@meatstick wrote:

I don’t have the source, but i’ll give you some hints;

FightEvent (instead of Player - Npc, it’s Npc - Npc)
In Mob(?).java there should be a method called “findVictim”, copy this and change Player to Npc, make sure this != (Victim)Npc

I can’t remember more, post your progress here and I’ll help you

Read full topic
